sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { add } from "../store/cartSlice" import { useEffect } from "react" export const Card = ({ product }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartList = useSelector((state) => state.cartState.cartList) const { name, price, image } = product useEffect(() => {}, []) return (

{name}

${price}

dispatch(add(product))} className="text-white p-2 rounded font-bold bg-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-900 hover:cursor-pointer" > Add to Cart
) }
